original_text: If a man has recently married, he must not be sent to war or have any other duty laid on him. For one year he is to be free to stay at home and bring happiness to the wife he has married.
korean_text: 사람이 새로이 아내를 맞이하였으면 그를 군대로 내보내지 말 것이요 아무 직무도 그에게 맡기지 말 것이며 그는 일 년 동안 한가하게 집에 있으면서 그가 맞이한 아내를 즐겁게 할지니라

sentences.original_text: If a man has recently married
he must not be sent to war
or have any other duty laid on him
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 그에게 다른 임무가 부과되어서는 안 된다

sentences.original_text: he is to be free to stay at home
and bring happiness to the wife
